src:
Prediksi Liga 1: Semen Padang FC Vs Persija Jakarta
06 Nov 2019, 07:45 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Liga 1 Indonesia musim ini menjadi ujian terberat bagi Persija Jakarta. Sebagai tim yang menyandang status sebagai juara bertahan liga berada di peringkat 15 klasemen sementara memang mengkhawatirkan.
Tim Macan Kemayoran hingga pekan ke-27 jaraknya lebih dekat ke zona degradasi. Memang Persija baru menjalani 24 laga. Namun defisit jumlah pertandingan belum menjadi jaminan bakal membawa tim menjauh dari degradasi.
Pekan ini pasukan Edson Tavares akan bertandang ke markas Semen Padang FC. Kedua tim dijadwalkan bermain di Stadion H. Agus Salim, Padang, pada Kamis, 7 November 2019. Laga akan disiarkan langsung Indosiar.
Semen Padang FC punya memori bagus saat melawan Persija. Di laga pertama, tim Kabau Sirah sukses menang 2-1. Catatan positif itu yang coba dijadikan modal bagi pelatih Semen Padang, Eduardo Almeida. Ia meminta para pemain untuk melupakan hasil negatif dua laga kandang sebelumnya.

Komentar Tim


Pelatih Semen Padang, Eduardo Almeida

"Mereka adalah tim yang kuat. Tapi ingat, kami pernah mengalahkannya dan nanti kami bermain di kandang tentunya ingin kembali meraih tiga angka."
"Kami ingin pemain lebih semangat dan lebih kuat mental lagi untuk bermain di kandang agar bisa meraih kemenangan. Tiga poin bagi kami sangat penting. Kemenangan harus bisa kami dapatkan di depan pendukung sendiri."

Bek Persija Jakarta, Alexandre Luis Reame

“Target melawan Semen Padang tentunya bisa melanjutkan tren positif ini agar bisa mengangkat posisi Persija dari situasi sulit di klasemen saat ini.”
Klasemen
Semen Padang masih kesulitan keluar dari zona degradasi. Kini mereka ada di dasar klasemen (ke-18) Liga 1 dengan mengoleksi 23 poin dari 26 laga. Sedangkan Persija menghuni posisi ke-15 dan membukukan 27 poin dari 24 pertandingan.

Head to Head

Di laga pertama Semen Padang menang 2-1 dari Persija. Namun bila melihat seluruh penampilan hingga pekan ke-27 ini, tim tuan rumah harus waspada. Irsyad Maulana dan kawan-kawan kerap gagal memanfaatkan status sebagai tuan rumah kala main di Padang.
Dari lima laga terakhir, Semen Padang hanya meraih sekali menang, satu kali imbang, dan tiga kali kalah. Sedangkan Persija meraih masing-masing dua kemenangan dan kekalahan serta sekali imbang dari lima pertandingan terakhir.

Prediksi

Laga diprediksi berjalan ketat. Namun Persija patut bersyukur menurunnya penampilan di musim ini tidak diikuti oleh anjloknya permainan Marko Simic. Pemain asal Kroasia ini tengah berlomba menjadi top skor Liga 1 dan sudah mengemas 16 gol. Dia bisa menjadi pembeda di laga yang dilakoni Persija.
Peluang Semen Padang FC menang 35 persen. Persija Jakarta menang 40 persen. Hasil seri 25 persen.

LIGA INDONESIA
text:
League 1 Prediction: Semen Padang FC vs Persija Jakarta
06 Nov 2019, 07:45 by Tempo.co, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian League 1 season is the toughest test for Persija Jakarta. As a team that holds the status of a defending champions league ranked 15th in the standings is indeed worrying.
The Kemayoran Tiger Team is closer to the relegation zone until the 27th week. Indeed Persija has only undergone 24 matches. But the deficit in the number of matches is not a guarantee that will bring the team away from relegation.
This week Edson Tavares's troops will travel to the Semen Padang FC headquarters. Both teams are scheduled to play at H. Agus Salim Stadium, Padang, on Thursday, November 7, 2019. The match will be broadcast live Indosiar.
Semen Padang FC has a good memory against Persija. In the first match, the Kabau Sirah team successfully won 2-1. That positive note is trying to be used as capital for Semen Padang coach, Eduardo Almeida. He asked the players to forget the negative results of the previous two home games.

Team Comments


Semen Padang coach, Eduardo Almeida

"They are a strong team. But remember, we never beat him and later we will play at home, of course, want to get back three points."
"We want players to be more motivated and stronger mentally to play at home in order to win. Three points are very important for us. The victory we can get in front of our own supporters."

Jakarta Persija defender, Alexandre Luis Reame

"The target against Semen Padang can certainly continue this positive trend in order to lift Persija's position from the difficult situation in the current standings."
Standings
Semen Padang is still having trouble getting out of the relegation zone. Now they are at the bottom of the standings (18th) League 1 by collecting 23 points from 26 matches. While Persija occupies the 15th position and posted 27 points from 24 matches.

Head to Head

In the first match Semen Padang won 2-1 from Persija. But if you look at all the performances until the 27th week, the home team must be vigilant. Irsyad Maulana and his friends often failed to take advantage of the status as host when playing in Padang.
Of the last five matches, Semen Padang won only one win, one draw and three defeats. While Persija won each of two wins and losses and a draw from the last five matches.

Prediction

Action is predicted to run tight. But Persija should be grateful for the decline in appearance this season was not followed by the drop in Marko Simic's game. The Croatian player is currently competing to be League 1's top scorer and has already scored 16 goals. He can be a differentiator in the action played Persija.
Semen Padang FC's chances of winning are 35 percent. Persija Jakarta wins 40 percent. Series results are 25 percent.

INDONESIA LIGA
